title: small talk...
author: paul d hunt

comments.content: I was up all night finessing squirly, lanky and downright ugly optical sizes.

Dang, I saw the first line of Paul's post in the RSS and thought there _really was_ a cool new technique for optical sizes. Rushed to this page only to find the clever Small Talk had reared its head again.

I've just updated the language file, bumping the 7 million combinations to over 25 million!

My whole reputation is built on scripting RoboFog to handle Garalde stuff, but I can see I'm probably boring you with these details.

I noticed that TrueType is not correctly inter-capped

Cheers, Si

Now I can talk like the pros with the Typophile Small Talk Generator.
